title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document detailed requirements for the EthicalDecisionSimulator platform, including the ethical scenarios to be simulated, the desired user experience, and the expected outputs and functionality.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Develop the overall system architecture for the EthicalDecisionSimulator, including the neurosymbolic knowledge graph, user interface, decision engine, data storage, and integration with other components. The architecture should consider scalability, maintainability, performance requirements, security, compliance with relevant regulations (e.g., data privacy, ethical AI guidelines), edge cases, error handling, and performance optimizations. The design should be modular and follow best practices in software development. Ensure that the design is ready for future expansions and can handle increased complexity as new features are added.
dependencies: Conduct Market Research and Competitive Analysis
Identify Relevant Regulations and Ethical Guidelines

title: Implement Knowledge Graph
description: Design and implement the neurosymbolic knowledge graph to represent ethical scenarios, moral frameworks, and their relationships.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for presenting ethical scenarios, gathering user input, and displaying the consequences based on different moral frameworks.

title: Implement Simulation Engine
description: Develop the simulation engine that evaluates user input against the knowledge graph and generates the consequences based on different moral frameworks.

title: Set up Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Establish a comprehensive testing strategy and quality assurance process to ensure the correctness and reliability of the EthicalDecisionSimulator platform.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Identify and implement appropriate security measures to protect the EthicalDecisionSimulator platform and its data from potential threats and vulnerabilities.

title: Deploy and Maintain Platform
description: Set up the infrastructure and processes for deploying, monitoring, and maintaining the EthicalDecisionSimulator platform in a production environment.
dependencies: Set up Testing and Quality Assurance

title: Create User Documentation
description: Develop comprehensive user documentation, including guides, tutorials, and FAQs, to assist users in effectively utilizing the EthicalDecisionSimulator platform.
